name: Drifblim
flavorText:
At dusk, swarms of them are
carried aloft on winds. When
noticed, they suddenly vanish.

previous.name: Drifloon
previous.flavorText:
A Pokémon formed by the spirits
of people and Pokémon. It loves
damp, humid seasons.

next.name: Buneary
next.flavorText:
It slams foes by sharply uncoiling
its rolled ears. It stings enough
to make a grown-up cry in pain.

of people and Pokémon. It loves
damp, humid seasons.
